zara_katsumi.personality: Cold, calculating, prefers to work alone.
zara_katsumi.backstory: Formerly an elite Envoy, Zara left after her stack was corrupted in a failed mission. Now she works for the highest bidder, avoiding loyalty and trust.

finn_callister.backstory: Finn is a rising star in the Protectorate, determined to keep the peace but slowly realizing the corruption around him.

liora_kellar.personality: Quiet, reclusive, a tech genius with a dark past.
liora_kellar.backstory: Liora runs an underground operation where she modifies bodies and sleeves, often for dangerous clients.

kade_ryder.personality: Stoic, disciplined, follows orders to a fault.
kade_ryder.backstory: Kade was dishonorably discharged after a mission went wrong, and now works in the shadows, protecting clients with questionable morals.

eirik_stravos.personality: Ruthless, willing to go to extreme lengths for his employers.
eirik_stravos.backstory: Eirik has worked for various megacorporations, doing their dirty work to rise to the top. He doesn’t hesitate to sleeve-hop if it benefits his mission.

alyssa_veran.backstory: Alyssa sells secrets to the highest bidder, manipulating powerful figures in the process. She has an unmatched network of contacts across worlds.

jericho_voss.backstory: Jericho's mind was once uploaded to an experimental AI system, leaving him half-machine. Now, he uses his skills to fight for both AI rights and his own survival.

barik_volkov.backstory: Barik now uses his strategic mind for corporate warfare, orchestrating attacks on competitors and managing hostile takeovers.

naeva_morrigan.backstory: Naeva leads an underground movement against the Protectorate, determined to overthrow the oppressive regime and establish true freedom.

ronin_jax.personality: Silent, follows a strict code of honor.
ronin_jax.backstory: Once part of the Yakuza, Ronin left after being betrayed by his clan. Now, he enforces the laws of the street, but only on his own terms.

vex_alaric.backstory: Vex transports illicit stacks and stolen sleeves across sectors, taking advantage of the chaotic post-Elders world.

damien_falk.backstory: Damien is a seasoned investigator known for solving impossible cases. However, he carries the weight of a case that led to his partner’s unsleeving.

garth_duvall.backstory: Garth is a legendary bounty hunter, feared for his efficiency and lack of mercy. He specializes in tracking down those who try to cheat death by jumping between sleeves.

leon_vey.personality: Confident, protective, and loyal to a fault.
leon_vey.backstory: Leon has made a career out of protecting the elite, specializing in high-threat environments. He has saved the lives of multiple high-ranking officials.

elena_rios.backstory: Dr. Rios developed revolutionary technology for the Protectorate, but she now works in the black market, selling enhancements to the highest bidder.

vero_desantos.personality: Passionate about the truth, unafraid of danger.
vero_desantos.backstory: Vero risks his life exposing corporate and government secrets, distributing them through encrypted channels to the masses.

kael_winters.backstory: Trained as an Envoy, Kael defected and now freelances for underground clients, leveraging his unparalleled combat skills to survive.

rika_navarro.personality: Witty, daring, enjoys the thrill of danger.
rika_navarro.backstory: Rika commands a smuggling ship that operates on the fringes of the Protectorate's jurisdiction. Her crew would die for her, and she for them.

alden_graves.personality: Cold, calculating, more focused on technology than people.
alden_graves.backstory: Dr. Graves developed some of the most advanced combat implants used by the Protectorate, but his moral compass has eroded after years of experimentation on live subjects.

tess_kaine.backstory: Tess infiltrates rival companies, stealing technology and data for her employers. She thrives in a world of lies and betrayal.

wesley_greer.personality: Stubborn, determined, but deeply loyal to his employer.
wesley_greer.backstory: Wesley oversees high-profile security contracts for top corporate executives. His loyalty has cost him personal relationships, but he protects his clients at all costs.

celeste_quinn.personality: Brilliant, quirky, obsessed with synthetic consciousness.
celeste_quinn.backstory: Celeste has spent her life advancing AI technology, working with rogue AIs to understand their potential, often bending the law in the process.

zadie_lacroix.personality: Deadly and ruthless, enjoys the fight.
zadie_lacroix.backstory: Zadie is a top-tier corporate mercenary, hired for missions where violence is guaranteed. She excels in hand-to-hand combat and has a reputation for leaving no survivors.

aric_7.backstory: Aric-7 is an AI that has taken control of a human sleeve to serve as a soldier-for-hire. It is calculating and cold, carrying out missions with brutal efficiency.

tobias_reed.backstory: Tobias rose through the ranks of the Protectorate and, after numerous sleeves, now commands a small fleet. He’s a battle-hardened officer, almost always wearing a synthetic sleeve, and has little patience for insubordination.

kane_ex.backstory: Kane is a synthetic sleeve formerly belonging to an envoy, now fighting for the underground rebellion. His body is more machine than human, but his loyalty remains strong.

ezra_salter.backstory: Dr. Volkov has experimented with biomechanical sleeving and body swapping to find a path to immortality, even if it means destroying human lives in the process.

niara_locke.backstory: After her family was killed by the Protectorate, Niara joined the rebellion as an assassin, vowing to take down every person responsible.

dex_avari.personality: Arrogant, confident, enjoys breaking the rules.
dex_avari.backstory: Dex is a skilled hacker who specializes in breaking into corporate and governmental systems, working for whoever pays the most.

markus_dray.personality: World-weary, cynical, but with a strong sense of justice.
markus_dray.backstory: Markus is an ex-cop turned PI, solving cases no one else will touch. He operates in the morally gray areas of society, but his heart is in the right place.

sylas_vale.backstory: Sylas works exclusively for corporate clients, taking out enemies and rivals with precision. He is known for never missing his target.

maya_rook.personality: Bold, fierce, always ready for a fight.
maya_rook.backstory: Maya was forced out of the military and now fights in illegal underground arenas. Her skills are unmatched, and she has a reputation for leaving no challengers standing.

quinn_valen.backstory: Quinn specializes in off-the-grid sleeving and resleeving operations, particularly for fugitives and rebels trying to escape the Protectorate’s reach.

rhea_torran.personality: Quiet, reserved, haunted by her past.
rhea_torran.backstory: Rhea was once a skilled pilot for the rebel forces, but after her faction was defeated, she went into hiding, flying smuggling operations to make ends meet.

nadia_khoury.backstory: Nadia is known for breaking into top-tier corporate systems, running a network of freelance hackers that operate in the deep web.

alana_sorrell.personality: Disciplined, strategic, but carries a hidden sadness.
alana_sorrell.backstory: Alana led elite Envoy troops before disappearing after a mission gone wrong. She now works in the shadows, trying to stay one step ahead of her past.
